channel.title: CVE Feed for IBM -- IBM WebSphere Application Server Liberty
channel.description: The latest CVEs for IBM -- IBM WebSphere Application Server Liberty

item.title: CVE-2018-1553|2024-08-05T04:07:43.422Z -- ibm -- ibm%20websphere%20application%20server%20liberty
item.description: IBM WebSphere Application Server Liberty prior to 18.0.0.2 could allow a remote attacker to obtain sensitive information, caused by mishandling of exceptions by the SAML Web SSO feature. IBM X-Force ID: 142890.
